description:
Against Hakaze`s sound advice, Mahiro continues his battle against the mage Natsumura. Hakaze has to help Yoshino save Mahiro’s life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekinai Koto wa, Mahou ni mo Aru
Hay cosas que aún la magia no puede hacer
There Are Things Even Magic Cannot Do
できないことは, 魔法にもある
